ComicInfo.Summary: Prophet and Wells search the time stream for any hint of the missing Kirby. When they find a clue to his whereabouts, Prophet leaps back in time to try and discover more about the location of his friend. He is attacked by a robot who interferes with his return trip home and Prophet gets lost in the time stream.
